H0.text: What group was led by Mullah Mohammad Omar. Haqqani Network

H1.text: What group was led by Mullah Mohammad Omar. Hezb-e-Islami

H2.text: What group was led by Mullah Mohammad Omar. Al-Qaeda

H3.text: What group was led by Mullah Mohammad Omar. Taleban

A4.text: Mullah Omar was the supreme commander of the Taliban.

A5.text: Under the leadership of Mullah Omar, the movement spread through most of Afghanistan, shifting power away from the Islamic State of Afghanistan, as well as other Mujahideen militants.
